mn152:2.1_0: Then the brahmin student Uttara, a pupil of the brahmin Pārāsariya, approached the Buddha.
mn152:2.2_0: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side.
mn152:2.3_0: “Uttara, does Pārāsariya teach his disciples the development of the faculties?”
mn152:2.6_0: “Master Gotama, it’s when the eye sees no sight and the ear hears no sound.
mn152:2.7_0: That’s how Pārāsariya teaches his disciples the development of the faculties.”
